main event: Three brilliant lights in V formation were observed moving slowly across the sky in San Mateo, California.
interesting points: The lights were brighter than the stars and spaced 2-3 degrees apart,The middle light disappeared while the other two continued westward,The remaining two lights turned off abruptly, leaving the area in darkness,The observer noted that the lights could not have been aircraft navigation lights due to their brightness and movement,The observation lasted for approximately 4-5 minutes.
sighted object: three brilliant lights in V formation
witness description: FAA air traffic controller at San Francisco International Airport
